StonelordArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Stonelord Paladin archetype regardless of race.

PhantasmalMageArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Phatasmal Mage Arcanist archetype regardless of race.

ReformedFiendArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Reformed Fiend Bloodrager archetype regardless of race.

CavalierOfThePawArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Cavalier of the Paw archetype regardless of race.

SpellDancerArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Spell Dancer archetype regardless of race.

StudentOfStoneArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Student of Stone archetype regardless of race.

PurifierArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Purifier archetype regardless of race.

MasterOfAllArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Master of All archetype regardless of race.

WildlandShamanArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Wildland Shaman archetype regardless of race.

ImitatorArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Imitator archetype regardless of race.

NineTailedHeirArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Nine-Tailed Heir archetype regardless of race.

CruoromancerArchetype.Description: Allows you to select the Cruoromancer archetype regardless of race.

GreenFaith.Description: Allows you to select the Green Faith Deity.

LichDeity.Description: Allows you to select the Knight Commander as a Deity.

Pulura.Description: Allows you to select Pulura as a Deity.

Milani.Description: Adds the minor goddess Milani, also known as the Everbloom, is the patron of all those who fight against oppression and unjust rule. Her symbol is a rose growing out of a blood-soaked street.

Ragathiel.Description: Adds the minor deity Ragathiel, who is a tower of glorious might. He stands almost 20 feet tall, and five lofty burning wings stretch from his back.

Arshea.Description: Adds the angel empyreal Lord Arshea, a champion of the repressed and weary. Arshea provides mortals deliverance from their bonds.

Apsu.Description: Adds Apsu, patron deity of all good and metallic dragons, and one of the oldest gods of the Great Beyond. Along with Tiamat, he is (at least according to draconic lore) believed to be one of the two original creator beings of the multiverse.

Dispater.Description: Adds the Archdevil Dispater, Hell's greatest jailer and politician who rules its second layer, Dis. Also known as the Iron Lord, Father of Dis and First King

Mephistopheles.Description: Adds The archdevil Mephistopheles, the ruler of Caina, the Eighth Layer of Hell, where he keeps many of Hell's greatest secrets and contracts.

Zura.Description: Adds The demon lord Zura, the Vampire Queen. Her unholy symbol is a blood-red, fanged skull, embossed with runes.

Baphomet.Description: Allows you to select Baphomet as a Deity.

Areshkegal.Description: Allows you to select the Areshkegal as a Deity.

Deskari.Description: Allows you to select Deskari as a Deity.

Kabriri.Description: Allows you to select Kabriri as a Deity.

Oathbreaker.Description: Adds a modified version of the Vindictive Bastard archetype as a full class.

Dread Knight.Description: Adds the Antipaladin as a class, renamed and modified slightly to fit the campaign setting.

Archduke of Cheliax.Description: [Request, not tuned for balance] The highest rank of the standard nobility in Cheliax are the Archdukes.

Living Scripture.Description: Adds the living scripture archetype, a requested inquisitor archetype that focuses on divine spellcasting.
